name: Scène de la Mer
description:
A brief, atmospheric poetry experience in French and English, created by students at McGill's Building 21.

Total playtime: 3-6 minutes.

This game was originally built for the Google Cardboard (Android version).

CREDITS:

Project lead & Programming:

Darius Valevicius

Writing & Voices:

Ève-Marie Marceau

Elissa Kayal

Environment Artist:

Kristofferson Brice (https://www.krisbrice.com/)
